name: Haunted Labyrinth
description:
Hello!

This is actually the third game I created. Hope you'll enjoy it!

I created this game alone in ~36h. 

Goal:

The goal is to collect 4 small gems and 1 big gem to win the game. The tiles position are changing every 4 seconds (the columns and lines) and the tiles that will change are indicated in red. If you're on one of them when the level changes, you'll lose.

Controls:

wasd or arrow keys to move the player

p or space to pause the game

Please leave a comment if you have any interrogation, suggestion or anything to say about the game :)
